name: Mad Sage
description:
Mad Sage - Play as a bizarre sorcerer, go to the magical forest and calm the monsters.
Master various spells that will help you in battle. The forest is full of different types of monsters, for each enemy you need to find your own approach.

You are a graduate of the magic academy and your first task is to show what you are capable of. Only a graduate who goes through the whole forest and remains alive is worthy of the title of a sorcerer.

The game is a 2D action roguelike. You need to move around the location destroying enemies.

Game Features:
-Nice pixel graphics
-Many enemies and weapons
-Good soundtrack
